res.content_title: How to Build Real-Time Data Streaming for AI | Jacqueline Cheong, Co-founder and CEO of Artie
res.tag_context: Snowflake is frequently mentioned as a major data warehouse destination that Artie integrates with, serving as a key example in discussions about data movement and customer use cases.

res.content_title: Snowflake vs Databricks: The AI Data War | CEO of $SNOW
res.tag_context: Snowflake is the primary focus of the interview, with CEO Sridhar discussing the company's AI transformation, competitive positioning, product strategy, and growth trajectory. The conversation extensively covers Snowflake's role in the AI data ecosystem and its evolution from a database company to an AI-powered data platform.

res.series_name: The Twenty Minute VC (20VC): Venture Capital | Startup Funding | The Pitch
res.tag_context: Chad was brought in 18 months ago to help find inefficiencies and drive higher performance in Snowflake's go-to-market function. He discusses implementing changes to their sales organization structure and addressing performance issues.

res.tag_context: Snowflake was analyzed as Databricks' main competitor, with discussion of their respective growth rates (28% vs 55%) and market positioning in data warehousing versus AI-centric applications.

res.content_title: 20Sales: Why You Need a CRO Pre-Product | Why Remote Sales Teams Do Not Work | How Snowflake Built a Sales Machine with Chad Peets
res.series_name: The Twenty Minute VC (20VC): Venture Capital | Startup Funding | The Pitch

The company served as the main case study for successful sales organization building.

res.content_title: Meet Snowflake Intelligence: A Personalized Enterprise Intelligence Agent with Sridhar Ramaswamy

The conversation covers the company's evolution from a data warehouse to an AI-first data platform.

res.tag_context: Snowflake was discussed as a foundational data layer company that will benefit from the shift away from SaaS data silos, with Workday's integration representing this trend.

The discussion covered Snowflake's go-to-market strategy, competitive positioning, product decisions, and organizational challenges throughout its growth journey.

res.content_title: Leadership Lessons From Snowflake’s Sales & Marketing Duo | Chris Degnan and Denise Persson
res.tag_context: Snowflake is the primary focus of the entire conversation, with extensive discussion of the company's growth from $3M to billions in revenue, its IPO, culture, sales and marketing strategies, and the speakers' roles in building the organization.

res.content_title: #286 Ram Venkatesh: How to Build, Operate & Scale Enterprise AI Agents (Sema4.ai)
res.tag_context: Snowflake was discussed as both a data storage platform that Semaphore integrates with and as a strategic partner. The speaker announced Semaphore's Team Edition that runs inside Snowflake accounts, allowing customers to deploy agents without leaving their Snowflake environment.

res.content_title: He went 7 years with no revenue— then grew to  $100M ARR. | Rob Woollen, Co-Founder of Sigma
res.series_name: A Product Market Fit Show | Startup Podcast for Founders
res.tag_context: Snowflake is discussed as a key partner and integration point for Sigma Computing. A pivotal meeting with Snowflake's CEO led to a significant product pivot for Sigma, and their partnership became crucial for Sigma's growth.

res.content_title: AI, Data Engineering, and the Modern Data Stack
res.tag_context: Snowflake is discussed in the context of the modern data stack and recent industry acquisitions. Its move into OLTP databases through the acquisition of Crunchy Data is highlighted as part of a broader industry trend.

res.content_title: EP 147: How Chris Degnan Built Snowflake's Sales Org From Scratch
res.tag_context: Snowflake was the primary focus of the conversation, discussing Chris Degnan's 11.5 year journey building the company's sales organization from scratch. The discussion covered Snowflake's growth, challenges, competitive positioning, and key strategic decisions throughout its history.

res.content_title: 20VC: Why Model Providers Will Kill Many Startups Moving into the Application Layer | Why Deepseek is not a Threat to OpenAI & Why OpenAI Beats Anthropic | Apps vs Models vs Infrastructure: Where is Value in AI with Sridhar Ramaswamy, Snowflake CEO
res.tag_context: Snowflake is the primary focus of the conversation, as Sridhar Ramaswamy is its CEO. The discussion covers Snowflake's position in the data and AI market, its growth strategies, and how it's adapting to AI advancements.

res.content_title: Kumo’s Hema Raghavan: Turning Graph AI into ROI
res.tag_context: Snowflake is discussed as a key partner for Kumo AI. The conversation covers how Kumo integrates with Snowflake's data warehouse and deploys as a native app within Snowflake's ecosystem.

res.content_title: Snowflake CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy on Using Data to Create Simple, Reliable AI for Businesses
res.tag_context: Snowflake is the primary focus of the conversation, discussed extensively as an AI data cloud platform. The CEO, Sridhar Ramaswamy, explains Snowflake's role in enterprise AI, its product offerings, and its approach to making AI applications reliable and accessible for businesses.

res.content_title: #205 CEO Snowflake, Sridhar Ramaswamy: Visibility
res.tag_context: Snowflake is the primary focus of the conversation, as Sridhar Ramaswamy is its CEO. The discussion covers Snowflake's business model, growth strategies, management practices, and future vision as an AI data cloud platform. Ramaswamy details his leadership approach and the company's challenges and opportunities.
